functions.name: Get holders of a ERC20 token
functions.description: Returns all holders of a specific ERC20 token

args.name: Contract address
args.description: The address of the ERC20 token contract

args.name: Network
args.description: The network of the ERC20. Available networks: mainnet, polygon

args.name: Minimum amount
args.description: Only holders that have at least this amount of tokens will be fetched

args.name: Forced value
args.description: Force a value for all the holders fetched. Otherwise, the value will be the token balance of the holder

functions.name: Get holders of a ERC721 token
functions.description: Returns all holders of a specific NFT (ERC721 token) contract

args.name: contractAddress
args.description: The address of the NFT contract
